statements: SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data;
SELECT id, trading_strategy, risk_level FROM risk_analysis_data;
SELECT trading_strategy, mitigation_strategy FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, trading_strategy, risk_level, mitigation_strategy FROM risk_analysis_data ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT trading_strategy, risk_level, assessment_date FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE trading_strategy = 'Option Strategies' ORDER BY risk_level ASC;
SELECT id, trading_strategy, mitigation_strategy FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, trading_strategy, risk_level FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE risk_level <= 2 AND mitigation_strategy IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01' AND (trading_strategy = 'Stock Investments' OR mitigation_strategy = 'Hedging');
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_date = '2022-02-01';
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM trades ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, risk_score, risk_level FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM trades;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100;
SELECT analysis_id, risk_score, risk_level FROM risk_analysis;
SELECT analysis_id, risk_description, risk_level FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_score FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE threat_category = 'Cybersecurity';
SELECT mitigation_description FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE mitigation_effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM TradingHistory WHERE successful = TRUE ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(strategy_id) AS total_strategies FROM MitigationStrategies;
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_score, threat_category FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE threat_category = 'Security' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, trade_date, trade_value FROM TradingHistory WHERE strategy_name = 'Strategy A' AND trade_value > 10000 ORDER BY trade_value DESC;
SELECT trade_date, trade_value, successful FROM TradingHistory WHERE successful = TRUE ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, mitigation_description, mitigation_effectiveness FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE mitigation_effectiveness >= 0.8 ORDER BY mitigation_effectiveness DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data;
SELECT id, risk_factor_name, risk_score FROM risk_analysis_data ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT threat_name, mitigation_strategy FROM threat_analysis WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT mitigation_name, effectiveness_rating, implementation_cost FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 5;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT threat_name, affected_table, mitigation_strategy FROM threat_analysis ORDER BY threat_name DESC;
SELECT risk_factor_name, risk_score FROM risk_analysis_data WHERE trading_strategy_id = 2;
SELECT mitigation_name, effectiveness_rating, implementation_cost FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData;
SELECT id, risk_level, risk_description FROM RiskAnalysisData ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, threat_level FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT strategy_id, mitigation_plan FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_type FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Long-term';
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT strategy_id, risk_description FROM RiskAnalysisData ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE threat_level = 'Medium' AND strategy_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_id, threat_description FROM ThreatAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT strategy_id, mitigation_plan FROM MitigationStrategies WHERE id = 1;
